/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees and streetlights punctuate the view, providing a sense of order amidst the urban hustle and bustle. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
